problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,以AB上一点O为圆心,OA为半径的圆与BC相切于点C,若∠A=28°,则∠B等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, a circle with a point O on AB as the center and a radius of OA and BC are tangent to point C. If ∠A = N_0, then ∠B is equal to ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是圆切线的性质及三角形外角定理,解答此类题目的关键是构造直角三角形求解．
